# Mathematical Operations {#mathops}

```{r echo = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 10, fig.height = 5,
                      comment = NA, cache = TRUE) 
```

```{r}
x <- 10
y <- 3
```

Standard arithmetic operations:

```{r}
x + y
x - y
x * y
x / 3
```
Exponentiation uses `^`:
```{r}
x^3
```

Integer division 
i.e. *Divide and forget about the remainder*
```{r}
x %/% 3
```

Modulo operation
i.e. *Divide and return just the remainder*
```{r}
x %% y
```
